author: Special Correspondent
text:
Christians observe Good Friday by taking part in special mass in Erode on Friday. —Photo: M. Govarthan

Christians assembled in churches to observe Good Friday with humility and reverence.

The most solemn day in the Christian calendar was marked by special mass in the churches.

There was a large gathering for the special mass held at the CSI Church along Brough Road.

Church services were held from midday onwards for three hours, the duration when Christians believe Jesus Christ was crucified on the cross.
title: Christians observe Good Friday with special prayers
